short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GitHub Button Editor makes it easy for you to open code repositories to the Github1s, CodeSandbox, Gitpod, and VSCode platforms.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: I always find it inconvenient to read code on GitHub, and even with things like Octotree, I always find it too much trouble to cut around and too slow to clone down some of the libraries, so I came up with the idea of having an online VS Code tool to read GitHub code
